features.title: Safe & Licensed
features.description: State-licensed facility with comprehensive safety protocols and background-checked staff.

features.title: Nutritious Meals
features.description: Healthy breakfast, lunch, and snacks provided daily to support growing bodies and minds.

features.title: Early Learning
features.description: Age-appropriate curriculum focusing on social, emotional, and cognitive development.

features.title: Nurturing Care
features.description: Small class sizes ensure each child receives individual attention and loving care.

features.title: Family Partnership
features.description: Open communication and collaboration with parents to support each child's growth.

features.title: Flexible Hours
features.description: Full-day care from 7 AM to 6 PM to accommodate working families' schedules.

enrollmentSteps.title: Schedule a Tour
enrollmentSteps.description: Visit our facility, meet Ms. Annie, and see our program in action.

enrollmentSteps.title: Complete Application
enrollmentSteps.description: Fill out our enrollment application with your child's information.

enrollmentSteps.title: Submit Documents
enrollmentSteps.description: Provide immunization records and emergency contact information.

enrollmentSteps.title: Welcome to the Family
enrollmentSteps.description: Complete orientation and start your child's journey with us.

keyPoints: Licensed by the Florida Department of Children and Families
Low student-to-teacher ratios for personalized attention
Affordable rates with flexible payment options
